body:
Comment 1: 
I think it is quite clear that a Ring element can have a nil value:

  "The zero value for a Ring is a one-element ring with a nil Value."

  "Len computes the number of elements in ring r. It executes in time proportional to the number of elements."

Capacity has no meaning here, as you can't change the length of the ring independent of
the number of Ring elements that comprise it.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
